Portfolio Wiki Blog Team Contact

Version Control

We use git as our version control tool, following the standard here.

Java

We follow Google Java Style.

C

We follow Microsoft C# Coding Conventions (C# Programming Guide).

Javascript

We follow AirBnB Javascript Code Style.

JSON

We follow Google JSON Style Guide.

Objective-C

We follow Google Objective-C Style Guide.

Swift

We follow Github Swift Style Guide. Because swift has not been finalized, this is a temporal solution. We are seeking more mature standard.

Python

We follow Google Python Style Guide.

Ruby

We follow Google Shell Style Guide.

Kompete

We build software.
